pages.text: The blue and red Orphic Pearls can be obtained from the treasure chests in the Altar Ruins. Defeating the Skeleton King has an 80% chance of dropping yellow and green Orphic Pearls. There is a chance of orange Orphic pearls in the treasure chest of Mordor. There is an 80% chance that a purple Orphic pearl will be dropped when you defeat the Outlander.
